abstract: If Rupert Murdoch is feeling anxious about the fate of News Corporation‘s $5 billion bid for Dow Jones, he didn’t let on at Tuesday night’s Alexander Hamilton dinner in New York, organized by the Manhattan Institute. According to DealBreaker, Mr. Murdoch told the audience a joke, or tried to:

headline.main: Falling Dow: Doubts Grow About Murdoch’s Bid
